input.description: adapter name [Optional] The name of the adapter that is enabled on the Peer. The default adapter name is HPSEActor

1. Provides the name of the specified host security group.
Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>list</command> <category>hostsecuritygroup</category> <process-id>find-host-security-group-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <hostsecuritygroup-id>1159</hostsecuritygroup-id> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. hostsecuritygroup-id[Required] Identifier for the hostsecuritygroup whose details are required.
2. Lists all the subcomponents belonging to the specified host security group.
Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>list</command> <category>hostsecuritygroup</category> <process-id>find-host-security-group-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <hostsecuritygroup-id>1159</hostsecuritygroup-id> <all/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. hostsecuritygroup-id[Required] Identifier for the hostsecuritygroup whose details are required. all[Required] Indicates that all the subcomponent details of the specified hostsecuritygroup are required.
3. Lists all the ports belonging to the specified host security group.
Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>list</command> <category>hostsecuritygroup</category> <process-id>find-host-security-group-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <hostsecuritygroup-id>1159</hostsecuritygroup-id> <port/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. hostsecuritygroup-id[Required] Identifier for the hostsecuritygroup whose details are required. port[Required] Indicates that all the ports belonging to the specified host security group are required.
4. Lists volumes in the host security group specified.
Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>list</command> <category>hostsecuritygroup</category> <process-id>find-host-security-group-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <hostsecuritygroup-id>1159</hostsecuritygroup-id> <volume/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. hostsecuritygroup-id[Required] Identifier for the hostsecuritygroup whose details are required. volume[Required] Indicates that all the volumes in the specified host security group are required.
5. Lists initiator ports associated with the host security group specified.
Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>list</command> <category>hostsecuritygroup</category> <process-id>find-host-security-group-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <hostsecuritygroup-id>1159</hostsecuritygroup-id> <initiator/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. hostsecuritygroup-id[Required] Identifier for the hostsecuritygroup whose details are required. initiator[Required] Indicates that all the initiator ports associated with the host security group specified are required.
6. Lists all the LUNs belonging to the specified host security group.
Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>list</command> <category>hostsecuritygroup</category> <process-id>find-host-security-group-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <hostsecuritygroup-id>1159</hostsecuritygroup-id> <lun/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. hostsecuritygroup-id[Required] Identifier for the hostsecuritygroup whose details are required. lun[Required] Indicates that all the LUNs belonging to the specified host security group are required.
7. Lists all the hardware IDs belonging to the specified host security group.
Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>list</command> <category>hostsecuritygroup</category> <process-id>find-host-security-group-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <hostsecuritygroup-id>1159</hostsecuritygroup-id> <hid/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. hostsecuritygroup-id[Required] Identifier for the hostsecuritygroup whose details are required. hid[Required] Indicates that all the hardware IDs belonging to the specified host security group are required.
8. Lists all the subordinate host security groups belonging to the specified host security group.
Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>list</command> <category>hostsecuritygroup</category> <process-id>find-host-security-group-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <hostsecuritygroup-id>1159</hostsecuritygroup-id> <subordinate/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. hostsecuritygroup-id[Required] Identifier for the hostsecuritygroup whose details are required. subordinate[Required] Indicates that all the subordinate host security groups belonging to the specified host security group are required.
9. Lists all the masking capabilities belonging to the specified host security group
Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>list</command> <category>hostsecuritygroup</category> <process-id>find-host-security-group-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <hostsecuritygroup-id>1159</hostsecuritygroup-id> <maskingcapabilities/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. hostsecuritygroup-id[Required] Identifier for the hostsecuritygroup whose details are required. maskingcapabilities[Required] Indicates that all the masking capabilities belonging to the specified host security group are required.
10. Provides a detailed description of the specified host security group.
Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>show</command> <category>hostsecuritygroup</category> <process-id>find-host-security-group-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <hostsecuritygroup-id>1159</hostsecuritygroup-id> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. hostsecuritygroup-id[Required] Identifier for the hostsecuritygroup whose details are required.
11. Provides a detailed description of all the subcomponents belonging to the specified host security group.
Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>show</command> <category>hostsecuritygroup</category> <process-id>find-host-security-group-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <hostsecuritygroup-id>1159</hostsecuritygroup-id> <all/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. hostsecuritygroup-id[Required] Identifier for the hostsecuritygroup whose details are required. all[Required] Indicates that all the subcomponent details of the specified hostsecuritygroup are required.
12. Provides a detailed description of all the ports belonging to the specified host security group.
Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>show</command> <category>hostsecuritygroup</category> <process-id>find-host-security-group-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <hostsecuritygroup-id>1159</hostsecuritygroup-id> <port/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. hostsecuritygroup-id[Required] Identifier for the hostsecuritygroup whose details are required. port[Required] Indicates that all the ports belonging to the specified host security group are required.
13. Provides a detailed description of volumes in the host security group specified.
Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>show</command> <category>hostsecuritygroup</category> <process-id>find-host-security-group-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <hostsecuritygroup-id>1159</hostsecuritygroup-id> <volume/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. hostsecuritygroup-id[Required] Identifier for the hostsecuritygroup whose details are required. volume[Required] Indicates that all the volumes in the specified host security group are required.
14. Provides a detailed description of initiator ports associated with the host security group specified.
Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>show</command> <category>hostsecuritygroup</category> <process-id>find-host-security-group-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <hostsecuritygroup-id>1159</hostsecuritygroup-id> <initiator/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. hostsecuritygroup-id[Required] Identifier for the hostsecuritygroup whose details are required. initiator[Required] Indicates that all the initiator ports associated with the host security group specified are required.
15. Provides a detailed description of all the LUNs belonging to the specified host security group.
Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>show</command> <category>hostsecuritygroup</category> <process-id>find-host-security-group-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <hostsecuritygroup-id>1159</hostsecuritygroup-id> <lun/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. hostsecuritygroup-id[Required] Identifier for the hostsecuritygroup whose details are required. lun[Required] Indicates that all the LUNs belonging to the specified host security group are required.
16. Provides a detailed description of all the hardware IDs belonging to the specified host security group.
Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>show</command> <category>hostsecuritygroup</category> <process-id>find-host-security-group-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <hostsecuritygroup-id>1159</hostsecuritygroup-id> <hid/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. hostsecuritygroup-id[Required] Identifier for the hostsecuritygroup whose details are required. hid[Required] Indicates that all the hardware IDs belonging to the specified host security group are required.
17. Provides a detailed description of all the subordinate host security groups belonging to the specified host security group.
Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>show</command> <category>hostsecuritygroup</category> <process-id>find-host-security-group-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <hostsecuritygroup-id>1159</hostsecuritygroup-id> <subordinate/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. hostsecuritygroup-id[Required] Identifier for the hostsecuritygroup whose details are required. subordinate[Required] Indicates that all the subordinate host security groups belonging to the specified host security group are required.
18. Provides a detailed description of all the masking capabilities belonging to the specified host security group
Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>show</command> <category>hostsecuritygroup</category> <process-id>find-host-security-group-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <hostsecuritygroup-id>1159</hostsecuritygroup-id> <maskingcapabilities/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. hostsecuritygroup-id[Required] Identifier for the hostsecuritygroup whose details are required. maskingcapabilities[Required] Indicates that all the masking capabilities belonging to the specified host security group are required.

documentation.description:
This wrapper supports the following requirements:-
1. Provides the name of the specified host security group. 2. Lists all the subcomponents belonging to the specified host security group. 3. Lists all the ports belonging to the specified host security group. 4. Lists volumes in the host security group specified. 5. Lists initiator ports associated with the host security group specified. 6. Lists all the LUNs belonging to the specified host security group. 7. Lists all the hardware IDs belonging to the specified host security group. 8. Lists all the subordinate host security groups belonging to the specified host security group. 9. Lists all the masking capabilities belonging to the specified host security group. 10. Provides a detailed description of the specified host security group. 11. Provides detailed information about all the subcomponents belonging to the specified host security group. 12. Provides detailed information about all the ports belonging to the specified host security group. 13. Provides detailed information about all volumes in the host security group specified. 14. Provides detailed information about all the initiators in the host security group specified. 15. Provides detailed information about all the LUNs belonging to the specified host security group. 16. Provides detailed information about all the hardware IDs belonging to the specified host security group. 17. Provides detailed information about all the subordinate host security group belonging to the specified host security group. 18. Provides detailed information about all the masking capabilities belonging to the specified host security group.
